---
category: news
title: "Mega Chip Packs 2.6 Trillion Transistors on One Huge Piece of Silicon"
excerpt: "Two years after releasing the \"world's largest computer chip,\" AI computing startup Cerebras Systems is upping the transistor punch from 1.2 trillion to 2.6 trillion. Most of the conversation today around chip design focuses on how we can make chips smaller to pack more punch into one area."
